009package Ch03_PointOperations;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
015import imagingbook.common.histogram.HistogramPlot;
016import imagingbook.common.histogram.HistogramUtils;
017import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
018
019/**
020 * <p>
021 * ImageJ plugin, adapts image intensities to match the histogram of another image
022 * selected by the user.
023 * See Sec. 3.6.4 (Fig. 3.16) of [1] for additional details.
024 * </p>
025 * <p>
026 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>,
027 * 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
028 * </p>
029 * 
030 * @author WB
031 * 
032 * @see HistogramPlot
033 * @see HistogramUtils
034 *
035 */
036public class Match_To_Image_Histogram implements PlugInFilter { 
037        
038        ImagePlus imB;  // reference image (selected interactively)
039        
040        @Override
041        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imA) {
042                return DOES_8G;
043        }
044        
045        @Override
046        public void run(ImageProcessor ipA) {
047                if (!runDialog() || imB == null) // select the reference image
048                        return;
049                
050                ImageProcessor ipB = imB.getProcessor();
051                
052                // get histograms of both images
053                int[] hA = ipA.getHistogram();
054                int[] hB = ipB.getHistogram();
055                (new HistogramPlot(hA, "Histogram A")).show();
056                (new HistogramPlot(hB, "Histogram B")).show();
057                (new HistogramPlot(HistogramUtils.cdf(hA), "Cumulative Histogram A")).show();
058                (new HistogramPlot(HistogramUtils.cdf(hB), "Cumulative Histogram B")).show();
059                
060                int[] F = HistogramUtils.matchHistograms(hA, hB);
061                
062//              for (int i = 0; i < F.length; i++) {
063//                      IJ.log(i + " -> " + F[i]);
064//              }
065                
066                ipA.applyTable(F);
067                int[] hAm = ipA.getHistogram();
068                (new HistogramPlot(hAm, "Histogram A (mod)")).show();
069                (new HistogramPlot(HistogramUtils.cdf(hAm), "Cumulative Histogram A (mod)")).show();
070        }
071
072        boolean runDialog() {
073                // get list of open images
074                
075                ImagePlus[] images = IjUtils.getOpenImages(true);
076                String[] titles = new String[images.length];
077                for (int i = 0; i < images.length; i++) {
078                        titles[i] = images[i].getShortTitle();
079                }
080                
081                // create dialog and show
082                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog("Select Reference Image");
083                gd.addChoice("Reference Image:", titles, titles[0]);
084                
085                gd.showDialog(); 
086                if (gd.wasCanceled()) 
087                        return false;
088                
089                imB = images[gd.getNextChoiceIndex()];
090                return true;
091        }
092
093}
094
